name: BadCat
description:
This game was made in Java Eclipse. It is my first game that I uploaded.
It is free, I appreciate your download, especially if you donate. Find me on facebook :  https://www.facebook.com/CrackedScreenStudio/ E-mail me:                          ivanat735@gmail.com Twitter:                               @ivanstajcer Game follows a badass cat  whose mission is to kill the devil. There is no real storyline here, you have been put in a random event and given a task to kill the devil. You have God as your friend who cheers for you. I hope you find this game funny and interesting,  I will be uploading more content in the future.Support me on Patreon:  https://www.patreon.com/ivanstajcer Note:  Extract everything in the same folder, and then run the BadCat.exe
